name: speech-assistant-openai-realtime-api-node
description: This application demonstrates how to use Node.js, [Twilio Voice](https://www.twilio.com/docs/voice) and [Media Streams](https://www.twilio.com/docs/voice/media-streams), and [OpenAI's Realtime API](https://platform.openai.com/docs/) to make a phone call to speak with an AI Assistant.
